Hozirontal gallery styling updated for light theme and mobile. New artwork pages for Kirby, Deltarune, Pokemon and La Mulana. Added art fandom TOC in the form of buttons and included the artwork number count per filter.

New artwork categories to have cross over artwork appear where they should: Pikmin, Project Moon, Splatoon, Super Puzzled Cat, Void Stranger. Removed cross over section for the time being. TWEWY artwork: Fixed some minor non-spoiler filtering between games vs series.

PostDate: 2025-03-14: Crossover Art Support and more Art
Site: Crossover art support! Not complete but it's on its way. Plan is have have all crossover art appear in the crossover art section and also in any fandom it's part of. Right now it's in one or the other. Also, the Art page's fandom description is a little smaller. And a big dump of artwork! And fixed Father's OC page to grab the right image and played with using asides for OC pages.
